translation.en: Hello?
translation.ja: 誰か？

translation.en: -[man 1] Turn him over. -[man 2] Is he alive?
translation.ja: 息はあるか？

translation.en: [woman] Can you hear me?
translation.ja: 聞こえる？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: ローナ

translation.en: Hey. Where are you? I've been calling for an hour.
translation.ja: 何度も電話したのよ

translation.en: Lorna, you're not my wife anymore.
translation.ja: もう妻じゃないだろ

translation.en: Thanks for that, Mick,
translation.ja: 知ってる

translation.en: I still get confused. Some days, I think I am your wife.
translation.ja: 気分的には妻というより⸺

translation.en: Others, I'm more like your mother.
translation.ja: 母親に近い

translation.en: Don't do that. Think I can't tell when you're holding the phone away?
translation.ja: スマホを耳から離したわね

translation.en: What I am is a person who runs this practice,
translation.ja: 連絡が取れないと困るの

translation.en: what's left of it anyway, and as such, I need to be able to reach you.
translation.ja: あなたの業務を片づけてるんだから

translation.en: Okay, you reached me. What's the problem?
translation.ja: 分かった　早く用件を言え

translation.en: [Lorna] We got a call from Judge Holder.
translation.ja: ホルダー判事が⸺

translation.en: -She wants to meet with you ASAP. -The Chief Judge?
translation.ja: すぐ会いたいと 判事長が？

translation.en: Technically, the presiding judge. Tell me you're not sleeping with her.
translation.ja: 厳密には首席判事 彼女と寝たの？

translation.en: No. Why would you even say that?
translation.ja: 寝るわけないだろ

translation.en: The only reason you'd be called to the private chambers of a female judge
translation.ja: 女性判事の執務室に呼ばれるなんて⸺

translation.en: is, A, you have a case before her, or B, you have a personal relationship.
translation.ja: 訴訟関連でなければ恋人くらいよ

translation.en: And since you haven't had any cases for a year…
translation.ja: １年 法廷に立ってないし…

translation.en: I never even met the woman.
translation.ja: 会ったこともない

translation.en: -She wants to meet with you now. -But she didn't say what it was about?
translation.ja: 急用があるみたい 内容は？

translation.en: No. But can we please allow for the possibility this might be positive?
translation.ja: いい話っていう可能性もあるでしょ

translation.en: Maybe she wants to assign you a case pro bono.
translation.ja: 公益弁護(プロボノ)を任せたいとか

translation.en: -Work begets work. -Well, maybe.
translation.ja: 公益弁護(プロボノ)を任せたいとか かもな

translation.en: Mick?
translation.ja: ミッキー？

translation.en: Still here.
translation.ja: 聞いてる

translation.en: Drive one of the Lincolns.
translation.ja: リンカーンに乗って

translation.en: They're in storage.
translation.ja: 倉庫だ

translation.en: Get one out of storage. The Lincoln becomes you.
translation.ja: リンカーンはあなたの一部でしょ

translation.en: And you become you.
translation.ja: 自分を取り戻せるわ

translation.en: Should this present as a real opportunity, you gotta go in there full Mickey Haller.
translation.ja: 自信満々のミッキー･ハラーで行ってよ

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: マギー

translation.en: You've got Hayley tonight. Just calling to remind.
translation.ja: ヘイリーとの約束は今夜よ

translation.en: 'Cause you think I'll forget?
translation.ja: 忘れるもんか

translation.en: Six o'clock, okay? Not 6:10. Not 6:05.
translation.ja: ６時だからね 数分の遅刻も許さない

translation.en: Who's the lucky guy? Do I know him?
translation.ja: 君は誰かとデートか？

translation.en: 6:00 p.m. sharp, Mickey.
translation.ja: ６時までに来てね

translation.en: [Mickey] I got it.
translation.ja: 分かったよ

translation.en: Hey, what can you tell me about Judge Mary Holder?
translation.ja: ホルダー判事は どんな人？

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: I don't know. She called me to her chambers.
translation.ja: 執務室に呼ばれた

translation.en: -Did you do something? -No, I haven't done something.
translation.ja: 何したの？ 何もしてない

translation.en: Then why would she call you to chambers?
translation.ja: じゃあ なぜ？

translation.en: I don't know, which is why I'm asking. What can you tell me about her?
translation.ja: 分からないから君に聞いてるんだ

translation.en: She's got a bug up her ass the size of the legal canon of ethics, which makes me think you've done something.
translation.ja: 彼女の倫理規範に触れるようなことをしたのよ

translation.en: -Thanks. -Wait, Mickey--
translation.ja: もういいよ

translation.en: I'll see you tonight.
translation.ja: また今夜

translation.en: He's done something.
translation.ja: 有罪ね

translation.en: [Lorna] Oh, hello, Mick.
translation.ja: ミッキー

translation.en: -Lorna. -I was driving this way anyway.
translation.ja: ローナ 近くに用が

translation.en: -No. You're checking up. -[Lorna] Says who?
translation.ja: ウソつけ 失礼ね

translation.en: You look good. I have always loved this one.
translation.ja: スーツもキマってる

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.ja: 何しに来た

translation.en: This could be a very big deal.
translation.ja: 相手は首席判事よ

translation.en: She's the presiding judge. So I came down to gather intel.
translation.ja: ただ事じゃないから情報を集めたくて

translation.en: And?
translation.ja: それで？

translation.en: Most of her work is administrative, which judge goes where and so forth.
translation.ja: 彼女の主な職務は判事の選任

translation.en: [Mickey] And?
translation.ja: それで？

translation.en: And… she assigns cases.
translation.ja: それから… 仕事の割り振りも

translation.en: -If that's what this is about… -You don't want me to blow it.
translation.ja: だから… しくじるな？

translation.en: I'm just saying, whatever this is, it has to go well. Okay?
translation.ja: 何であろうときっとうまくいくわ

translation.en: [Holder] Mr. Haller, I presume.
translation.ja: ハラーさんね

translation.en: Judge Holder.
translation.ja: ホルダー判事

translation.en: I don't believe we've met before.
translation.ja: 会うのは初めてね

translation.en: No, Your Honor.
translation.ja: そうです

translation.en: Well, come on then.
translation.ja: 中で話しましょう

translation.en: The Lincoln Lawyer, that what they call you?
translation.ja: 通称“リンカーン弁護士”

translation.en: Some do, yes.
translation.ja: そうです

translation.en: Or did.
translation.ja: 以前は

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: 由来は？

translation.en: Mainly worked out of my car. Going from court to court. All the driving and so forth.
translation.ja: 車を事務所代わりにして裁判所間を移動してました

translation.en: Being ready to flee the jurisdiction if need be.
translation.ja: 管轄区域外にも逃げられる

translation.en: Never fled the jurisdiction.
translation.ja: 逃げてません

translation.en: Have a seat.
translation.ja: 座って

translation.en: What's your relationship with Jerry Vincent?
translation.ja: ジェリー･ヴィンセントを？

translation.en: Jerry Vincent?
translation.ja: ジェリー？

translation.en: Uh, I used to go up against him back when he was a prosecutor.
translation.ja: 彼が検察官の時は法廷で争ってました

translation.en: And he switched sides.
translation.ja: 今は弁護士に

translation.en: He was murdered last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜 殺された

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: 何ですって？

translation.en: Shot dead in his car.
translation.ja: 車内で撃たれた

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: そんな

translation.en: If you were close, please accept my condolences, but that's not why you're here.
translation.ja: お悔やみ申し上げるわでも用件は別よ

translation.en: Were you close?
translation.ja: 親しかった？

translation.en: I mean, friendly. Colleagues, mostly.
translation.ja: 仕事仲間として付き合いが

translation.en: He left you his practice.
translation.ja: あなたに仕事を残した

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
translation.ja: と言いますと？

translation.en: Mr. Vincent filed a motion with the court ten days ago
translation.ja: 10日前に申請していたの

translation.en: that allowed for the transfer of his entire practice to you,
translation.ja: 自分の身に何かあった時は 全担当業務をあなたに移管すると

translation.en: should he become incapacitated or deceased.
translation.ja: 全担当業務をあなたに移管すると

translation.en: -He never discussed this with you? -No.
translation.ja: 彼から事前に相談は？ いえ

translation.en: Well, last night he became deceased, which means what was his is now yours.
translation.ja: 彼は亡くなったのであなたに移管されます

translation.en: Including the Trevor Elliott trial. You have heard of that?
translation.ja: トレヴァー･エリオットの事件もね

translation.en: The tech guy who killed his wife and her boyfriend.
translation.ja: 妻と愛人を殺害した男

translation.en: Allegedly.
translation.ja: 起訴状では

translation.en: Of course.
translation.ja: そうですね

translation.en: That's now my case?
translation.ja: その件を私が？

translation.en: They're all your cases, Mr. Haller. You might not get to keep them.
translation.ja: すべての件よでも その先は依頼人次第

translation.en: Every client has a right to move on to another attorney once apprised of Mr. Vincent's demise.
translation.ja: 彼らには別の代理人に変える権利がある

translation.en: What it does mean is you get first shot.
translation.ja: 最初に交渉できるというだけ

translation.en: Assuming I'm satisfied that Mr. Vincent's clients are being transferred to a replacement counsel
translation.ja: ヴィンセントの依頼人を任せられるほど優秀だと⸺

translation.en: of good standing and competent skill.
translation.ja: 私が認めればだけど

translation.en: As far as I can tell, you haven't had any cases in quite some time.
translation.ja: しばらく法廷には立っていないそうね

translation.en: Yeah. [clears throat] I was in an accident about 18 months ago.
translation.ja: １年半前事故に遭ったんです

translation.en: Surfing, if you can believe it.
translation.ja: サーフィンの事故です

translation.en: I had multiple surgeries and, well, there were complications.
translation.ja: 何度か手術を受けてその後は合併症に

translation.en: Complications?
translation.ja: 合併症？

translation.en: I took painkillers. Got addicted to 'em. But that's over now. I got help.
translation.ja: それで鎮痛剤の依存症に ですが今は克服しました

translation.en: Got clean. So whatever concerns you may have about my reputation, I--
translation.ja: なので私の立場への心配は…

translation.en: It's my reputation I'm concerned about. I'm the one that has to sign off on you.
translation.ja: 心配してるのは承認する私の立場よ

translation.en: Or not.
translation.ja: 却下もできる

translation.en: Why you? Of all the lawyers out there.
translation.ja: なぜ自分が選ばれたと思う？

translation.en: Honestly, Your Honor, I have no idea.
translation.ja: 見当もつきません

translation.en: Well, if you were to guess?
translation.ja: 考えてみて

translation.en: Well, as I said, Jerry and I were friendly, we trusted each other.
translation.ja: ジェリーとは信頼し合ってた

translation.en: And second, though this is subjective,
translation.ja: また これは私見ですが⸺

translation.en: when I am right, there's no better criminal defense attorney in Los Angeles
translation.ja: 私はＬＡ最高の刑事弁護士です

translation.en: and Jerry knew that from personal experience.
translation.ja: ジェリーも そう判断した

translation.en: And you think you're right now?
translation.ja: 今も自信がある？

translation.en: I do.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: This is an order transferring Mr. Vincent's practice to you.
translation.ja: ヴィンセントの後継に任命します 〝メアリ･ホルダー〞

translation.en: I can rescind it just as fast.
translation.ja: 私には撤回の権利も

translation.en: I will be monitoring you, Mr. Haller.
translation.ja: あなたを監視します

translation.en: I want an updated inventory of cases by the beginning of next week.
translation.ja: 来週までに事件のリストを出して

translation.en: After that, a bi-weekly status update
translation.ja: 依頼人に任された事件は⸺

translation.en: of every case on which you will remain counsel.
translation.ja: 進捗を隔週で報告すること

translation.en: -Am I clear? -I won't let you down, Your Honor.
translation.ja: いいですか？ 期待に応えます

translation.en: Don't let your clients down.
translation.ja: 依頼人たちのね

translation.en: I suggest you get to Mr. Vincent's office right now.
translation.ja: すぐにヴィンセントの事務所へ行って

translation.en: The police are, no doubt, searching it and probably invading their privacy as we speak.
translation.ja: 依頼人のプライバシーを警察が侵害してる

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.ja: 感謝します

translation.en: Good luck, Mr. Haller.
translation.ja: 健闘を祈るわ

translation.en: Well, did you get a case?
translation.ja: 待って 新しい仕事？

translation.en: I just got a lot of them.
translation.ja: 大量にな

translation.en: Including Trevor Elliott.
translation.ja: エリオット事件も

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: え？

translation.en: I need to meet the clients, get their sign-offs, but I might be back, Lorna.
translation.ja: 依頼人の承認が必要だが復帰できそうだ

translation.en: I might actually be back.
translation.ja: 仕事ができた

translation.en: What did I tell you about positive visualization?
translation.ja: ポジティブ思考が大事よ

translation.en: You wake up, not a single client. Now, you are repping a guy like Trevor Elliott in a murder trial.
translation.ja: 依頼人ゼロの状態から一気にエリオットの代理人に

translation.en: If he decides to keep me.
translation.ja: それは彼次第だ

translation.en: [Lorna] Positive thinking, Mickey. Positive thinking.
translation.ja: ポジティブにいきましょ

translation.en: -Floor is closed, folks. -We have business on this floor.
translation.ja: 閉鎖中です 仕事があって

translation.en: -Not today, you don't. -Talk to the judge.
translation.ja: ダメです 判事の命令だ

translation.en: Need to see some ID.
translation.ja: 身分証を

translation.en: You know, you don't help yourselves being dicky-do's.
translation.ja: 感じ悪いのは わざと？

translation.en: Just saying.
translation.ja: 何よ

translation.en: -Can I help you? -Mickey Haller. I'm an attorney.
translation.ja: どちら様？ ヴィンセントの後継ミッキー･ハラーです

translation.en: I've taken over Mr. Vincent's practice.
translation.ja: ヴィンセントの後継ミッキー･ハラーです

translation.en: You need to come back tomorrow. This is a crime scene. It's sealed off.
translation.ja: 現場検証中だ明日にしてくれ 犯行現場はここじゃなく駐車場だ

translation.en: The crime scene was a parking garage, not this office.
translation.ja: 犯行現場はここじゃなく駐車場だ

translation.en: There are client files here I need to access and apparently safeguard.
translation.ja: 依頼人のファイルを保護したい

translation.en: What'd you say your name was?
translation.ja: 名前は？

translation.en: Mickey Haller. This is Lorna Crane. She works with me.
translation.ja: ミッキー･ハラーと同僚のローナ･クレーン

translation.en: Well, Mickey Haller and Lorna Crane,
translation.ja: ミッキー･ハラーとローナ･クレーン

translation.en: I need you to both leave. Now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ出て行ってくれ

translation.en: -Dicky-do's, I'm telling you. -What was that?
translation.ja: 感じ悪い 何だ？

translation.en: That wasn't meant for you. But if you heard me, you heard me.
translation.ja: 聞こえたなら ごめんなさい

translation.en: You're contaminating a crime scene. You can't be here.
translation.ja: 現場を荒らされては困る

translation.en: This order will confirm I've been appointed by the presiding judge of the Superior Court
translation.ja: 上級裁判所の首席判事から正式に任命された

translation.en: as replacement counsel to Jerry Vincent's clients. That means his cases are now my cases,
translation.ja: ヴィンセントの依頼人は私の依頼人だ

translation.en: and you have no right to be in here looking through files. That's attorney-client privilege.
translation.ja: 秘匿特権によりファイルの閲覧を禁ずる

translation.en: Mr. Vincent's been murdered. The motive could be in one of these files.
translation.ja: 殺害の動機が見つかるかも

translation.en: -Even if that were the case-- -Counselor--
translation.ja: それでもだ だが…

translation.en: Just read the order, Detective.
translation.ja: 命令書を読め

translation.en: Your crime scene is out in the garage and no judge in LA would extend it to this office and these files.
translation.ja: どんな判事もここを犯行現場とは認めない

translation.en: You say this gives you all of Mr. Vincent's cases?
translation.ja: ヴィンセントの担当事件をすべて？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: -Then that puts you on our list. -Come again.
translation.ja: リストに入れる 何の？

translation.en: Our suspect list.
translation.ja: 容疑者リストだ

translation.en: He's dead and you get the whole business? That's motive, ask me.
translation.ja: 仕事を譲り受けたなら十分に動機になり得る

translation.en: Care to tell us where you were last night between 8:00 and midnight?
translation.ja: 昨夜８時から０時の間はどこにいた？

translation.en: You got me, Detective. You got me.
translation.ja: 恐れ入ったよ

translation.en: I killed Jerry. Case closed, everybody.
translation.ja: 彼を殺したのは俺だ 事件は解決だ

translation.en: Clearly you've done this before.
translation.ja: 俺には通用しない

translation.en: Are you gonna get out of here, or do I need to call the judge?
translation.ja: 出て行かなければ判事に連絡する

translation.en: -Guys. -Nice to meet you, too.
translation.ja: 撤収だ ごきげんよう

translation.en: -Bye. -[detective] Let's go.
translation.ja: じゃあね 行くぞ

translation.en: Leave everything.
translation.ja: そのままで

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: All right. Come on.
translation.ja: 始めるぞ

translation.en: [Lorna] Sometimes I think they teach it in the academy,
translation.ja: 警察学校で人の怒らせ方を教わるのかも 警察学校で人の怒らせ方を教わるのかも 〝人気ゲームの創造者〞

translation.en: how to piss people off.
translation.ja: 警察学校で人の怒らせ方を教わるのかも 〝人気ゲームの創造者〞 〝人気ゲームの創造者〞

translation.en: When you think of all the bad blood between the people and police,
translation.ja: 〝人気ゲームの創造者〞 市民の警察への敵意を考えたら⸺ 市民の警察への敵意を考えたら⸺

translation.en: you'd think "how not to piss people off" would be in the curriculum.
translation.ja: 市民の警察への敵意を考えたら⸺ 逆のことを教えるべきよ

translation.en: How would you feel about me hiring Cisco?
translation.ja: シスコを雇おうか

translation.en: Mickey.
translation.ja: 本気？

translation.en: He's a good investigator. One of the best I've worked with.
translation.ja: 腕利きの調査員だ

translation.en: Working with your ex-wife is one thing, hiring her boyfriend is pushing it, even for you.
translation.ja: 元妻と働くだけじゃなくその恋人まで雇うの？

translation.en: If Trevor Elliott decides to keep me,
translation.ja: エリオットの事件は⸺

translation.en: I'm gonna need to move fast with an investigator I can trust, and Cisco--
translation.ja: 迅速に動ける優秀な調査員が必要だ

translation.en: Yeah, Mickey Haller.
translation.ja: ハラーです

translation.en: Yes, sir. 2:00 p.m. As in 2:00 p.m. today?
translation.ja: ２時から？　今日のですか？

translation.en: Yes, sir, I'll be there. Thank you.
translation.ja: 分かりました　行きます

translation.en: Who was that?
translation.ja: 誰から？

translation.en: [sighs] It's Judge Canter's clerk. It seems Jerry has a trial today.
translation.ja: ジェリーが予定してた公判がある

translation.en: -What? -Yep.
translation.ja: 今日？ そうだ

translation.en: -Are you gonna eat your sandwich? -No, Lorna, you can have it.
translation.ja: サンドイッチは？ 食べてくれ

translation.en: Thank you. Run.
translation.ja: どうも　急いで

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: -I'm covering for Jerry Vincent. -Oh, I heard.
translation.ja: ジェリーの後継だ お気の毒に　名前は？

translation.en: Sorry. What's the name?
translation.ja: お気の毒に　名前は？

translation.en: Haller. Mickey Haller.
translation.ja: ミッキー･ハラーだ

translation.en: And your client's name?
translation.ja: 依頼人の名前

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: It's, uh… Letts, first name Izzy. I think it's a theft.
translation.ja: イジー･レッツだな窃盗容疑だと思う

translation.en: That would be Marc Daniels, who I'm covering for, so that's actually mine.
translation.ja: 担当はマーク･ダニエルズ私が彼の代理よ

translation.en: -Grand theft, by the by. -Obviously I'm gonna need a continuance.
translation.ja: 重窃盗罪ね 延期を求める

translation.en: Obviously I'm not gonna give it to you.
translation.ja: 認めない

translation.en: -What? -I got out-of-town witnesses.
translation.ja: なぜ？ 遠方から来てる証人に私が責められる

translation.en: I'd rather they be pissed off with the judge or you than me,
translation.ja: 遠方から来てる証人に私が責められる

translation.en: especially if I wanna get them back.
translation.ja: 早く帰したいし

translation.en: [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.ja: LA-292587州民対イジー･レッツ

translation.en: And we're on.
translation.ja: 始まった

translation.en: Sarah Shepard for the People, Judge. Ready for trial.
translation.ja: 検察側のサラ･シェパードです

translation.en: Mickey Haller for the defendant, Your Honor.
translation.ja: 被告側のミッキー･ハラーです

translation.en: I'll be with you in one second. May I approach?
translation.ja: 後で説明を お話が

translation.en: Your Honor, Mr. Vincent unexpectedly passed yesterday. I'm filing in.
translation.ja: ヴィンセントが亡くなり私が後継弁護人に

translation.en: My sincere condolences. When will you be ready?
translation.ja: お悔やみを　いつがいい？

translation.en: -Well… -[Wallace] Don't be greedy.
translation.ja: では… 証人が２人 来てる

translation.en: It's a bench trial with two witnesses.

translation.en: When I look back, I always wanted to be a defense lawyer,
translation.ja: 昔から弁護士になりたかった

translation.en: ever since I was a kid watching my dad.
translation.ja: 父親を見てきたからな

translation.en: The stuff they teach you in law school, how the system's supposed to work.
translation.ja: ロースクールでは司法制度の仕組みを学ぶ

translation.en: You get out there and it's all just muddy. Everybody's working an angle.
translation.ja: だが実際の現場は泥沼だ策略が渦巻き⸺

translation.en: Everybody lies.
translation.ja: 皆ウソをつく

translation.en: After a while you wonder if you're doing any good at all.
translation.ja: 何がいいことか分からなくなる

translation.en: You know Mom never feels that way, right? She just puts bad people away.
translation.ja: ママは そう思ってないよ 悪い人たちを刑務所に送るだけ

translation.en: Your mom's a true believer. That's what makes her so great at what she does.
translation.ja: ママは信念があるだから優秀なんだ

translation.en: But you're not?
translation.ja: パパは？

translation.en: I was. I think I still am.
translation.ja: 同じだったよ 今でも そうだと思いたい

translation.en: Look, I believe that in our system, everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
translation.ja: 有罪が確定するまでは誰もが無実だと信じる

translation.en: Now, when the State points the finger at you, well, I'm all you got.
translation.ja: たとえ州政府が敵でも俺は味方だ

translation.en: Now what?
translation.ja: 誰だ？

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.ja: ウソだろ？

translation.en: Sorry to intrude.
translation.ja: すまない

translation.en: This better be good, Detective.
translation.ja: 大事な用だろうな？

translation.en: It's important.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: We really gotta see Jerry Vincent's files.
translation.ja: ヴィンセントのファイルが必要なんだ

translation.en: I realize you have attorney-client privilege.
translation.ja: 秘匿特権は理解してる

translation.en: DA says you probably have the right to shut us down.
translation.ja: 検察も君は拒否するだろうと

translation.en: Seriously? I knew this guy.
translation.ja: 被害者は知り合いなんだ

translation.en: I really need you to see what we're up against.
translation.ja: 犯人の手口を見てくれ

translation.en: It's a kill shot to the head, very clean.
translation.ja: 頭を正確に撃った しかも撃った後薬莢(やっきょう)を拾ってる

translation.en: Whoever pulled the trigger picked up the shell casings too.
translation.ja: しかも撃った後薬莢(やっきょう)を拾ってる

translation.en: Someone targeted Jerry Vincent
translation.ja: ヴィンセントを狙ったんだ

translation.en: and they didn't take his wallet or his cash.
translation.ja: ヴィンセントを狙ったんだ カネではなくカバンとパソコンを盗んだ

translation.en: They took his bag with his laptop.
translation.ja: カネではなくカバンとパソコンを盗んだ

translation.en: Now, the question is, what was on there? What did he know that got him killed?
translation.ja: そこに何が入ってたのか 何を知って殺されたのか

translation.en: If the answer's any place, it's probably in his files.
translation.ja: 答えは彼のファイルにある

translation.en: I wish I could help you, Detective, I really do.
translation.ja: 協力したいがそれはできない

translation.en: I'm asking you to help yourself.
translation.ja: これは君のためでもある

translation.en: You're at risk, Counselor.
translation.ja: 君も危険だぞ

translation.en: You could be next.
translation.ja: 次の標的に

translation.en: [Cisco] Was Jerry involved with wise guys or cartel guys?
translation.ja: ジェリーは裏社会とつながりが？

translation.en: I doubt it, he was straight ahead.
translation.ja: それはないだろう

translation.en: -Ex-prosecutor. -Maybe it's someone he put in prison.
translation.ja: 元検察官だ ムショに送ったヤツは？

translation.en: One second.
translation.ja: ちょっと待て

translation.en: Yeah, I thought about that. Comb through the files.
translation.ja: ファイルを洗ってくれ

translation.en: Look for any hint of threats, clients, ex-clients, everybody, all right?
translation.ja: 過去の依頼人も含め全員を調べるんだ

translation.en: I'm on it.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: In the meantime, Elliott gave us access to his house in Malibu where the murders happened.
translation.ja: エリオットから犯行現場に入る許可を得た

translation.en: It's important we get a true picture.
translation.ja: 真相を知っておきたい

translation.en: I'll shoot you the address. Let's meet there around noon.
translation.ja: 住所を送るから正午に落ち合おう

translation.en: This means we have the case?
translation.ja: 決まりか？

translation.en: Not yet. The more we learn the better our chances.
translation.ja: まだだが情報は強みになる

translation.en: -Where are you right now? -Heading into trial.
translation.ja: 今どこに？ 裁判所だ

translation.en: Marvin.
translation.ja: マーヴィン

translation.en: -Oh! Mickey! -Thanks for coming. I appreciate this.
translation.ja: ミッキー 来てくれて ありがとう

translation.en: Why wouldn't I?
translation.ja: 当然さ

translation.en: When the greatest person I ever met asks for my help, I give my help.
translation.ja: こんな偉大な人物に頼まれて断るわけがない

translation.en: How's Eleanor?
translation.ja: エレノアは？

translation.en: Oh, she's absolutely fantastic is how she is. And she sends her love.
translation.ja: とても元気にやってるよ 君によろしくと

translation.en: Send my love to her. Thank you.
translation.ja: 俺からも よろしく伝えて

translation.en: [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.ja: 州民対イジー･レッツ

translation.en: Be with you in a second.
translation.ja: 少し待ってて

translation.en: Mickey Haller, Judge, asks that we approach?
translation.ja: 判事　お話があります

translation.en: Please tell me you're ready.
translation.ja: 準備は？

translation.en: -Almost, Judge. -[Wallace] Mr. Haller.
translation.ja: あと少しで つまり？

translation.en: Actually, Judge. At the risk of further antagonizing Mr. Holt, maybe we call him up for the sidebar?
translation.ja: ホルトさんが また怒る前にここで話しませんか？

translation.en: -Excuse me? -What's going on?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: A bit unorthodox, but in the best interests of judicial economy and justice.
translation.ja: 異例ですがこれが一番 効率的かと

translation.en: Take 30 seconds.
translation.ja: すぐ済みます

translation.en: Mr. Holt.
translation.ja: ホルトさん

translation.en: Could you approach the bench?
translation.ja: 法壇の近くへ

translation.en: How you doin'? All right, I'll make this quick.
translation.ja: 何です？ 手短に

translation.en: My client is charged with grand theft.
translation.ja: 容疑は重窃盗罪です

translation.en: Which under Section 487 of the Penal Code
translation.ja: 刑法487条によると⸺

translation.en: means the value of the stolen object exceeds $950.
translation.ja: 盗品の価値が950ドル以上となっています

translation.en: Your Honor, that necklace is worth what, $400, tops?
translation.ja: あのネックレスは最高でも400ドル程度

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: I've taken few payments in diamonds and gold, developed a pretty good eye.
translation.ja: ダイヤや金(きん)には目が利くんです

translation.en: But to be sure, Judge, I also brought with me an expert on the matter.
translation.ja: でも念のため専門家も連れてきました

translation.en: That is Marvin Beedleman. He's a jeweler.
translation.ja: 宝石商のビードルマンです

translation.en: He can give us a pretty quick appraisal.
translation.ja: すぐに査定できます

translation.en: The District Attorney might want to get one of her own.
translation.ja: 検察側に鑑定士がいなければ

translation.en: Guessing your wife doesn't know it's a knock-off? I, of course, don't want to upset her.
translation.ja: 奥様に知られずに調べたいかと

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.ja: 何かの冗談か？

translation.en: I am not. I am not.
translation.ja: 私は本気です

translation.en: Even if it is a knock-off, the defendant thought she was stealing the real thing.
translation.ja: でも被告は本物だと思って盗んだのです

translation.en: You have a witness to testify as to her state of mind?
translation.ja: それを証明する証人が？

translation.en: Did you not have the necklace appraised?
translation.ja: 査定してないんですか？

translation.en: We have the appraisal from his insurance company.
translation.ja: 彼の保険会社が査定を

translation.en: Might open up a whole new can of fraud.
translation.ja: 不正の臭いがする

translation.en: I could be wrong, of course.
translation.ja: 可能性ですが

translation.en: Miss Shepard, any thoughts on how you might like to play this?
translation.ja: 検察側から他に提案はありますか？

translation.en: Completely dismissed? I get to just go?
translation.ja: 棄却？　帰っていいの？

translation.en: Well, unless the DA decides to prosecute the Holts and you get called as a witness against them,
translation.ja: ホルトが訴追されたら証人として呼ばれるかもな

translation.en: but I don't think that'll happen.
translation.ja: 可能性は低いが

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 驚いた

translation.en: Didn't even have to get up there and testify as to what a nice person you are.
translation.ja: 自分が善人だと証言できなかったな

translation.en: [chuckles] I don't know how to thank you. I will pay you one day, I promise.
translation.ja: ありがとういつか必ず支払うわ

translation.en: You pay me now.
translation.ja: すぐ払ってくれ

translation.en: I'm broke. I don't have a nickel to my name.
translation.ja: 今は無一文だもの

translation.en: Have a driver's license?
translation.ja: 運転免許は？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: 何で？

translation.en: [Lorna] What do you mean you hired her?
translation.ja: 雇ったの？

translation.en: I told you I needed a driver, and she can drive.
translation.ja: 運転手が必要だった

translation.en: I'm actually a good driver.
translation.ja: 運転はうまいよ

translation.en: She's actually a good driver, Lorna.
translation.ja: 運転はうまいそうだ

translation.en: [Lorna] It wouldn't kill you to work from an office.
translation.ja: 事務所があるのに 移動しながら仕事したいんだ

translation.en: Too much structure. I gotta work while I'm on the move.
translation.ja: 移動しながら仕事したいんだ

translation.en: -Didn't you say she's an addict? -Former. Who am I to judge? Turn right.
translation.ja: 依存症じゃ？ 俺と同じ“元”だ そこを右

translation.en: I'm almost there. Call you back.
translation.ja: もう着くから

translation.en: Mickey, no-- [groans]
translation.ja: ねえ…

translation.en: -Maggie. -Hi, Lorna. Nice to see you.
translation.ja: マギー ローナ　久しぶり

translation.en: Um, thank you, and likewise. You look pretty.
translation.ja: ローナ　久しぶり 本当に 相変わらず美人ね

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
translation.ja: どうかした？

translation.en: We both care for him, Lorna.
translation.ja: 私たちは彼の味方

translation.en: And I mean, I'm happy for all this positive turn of events for Mickey…
translation.ja: 今回のことはいい変化になったと思う

translation.en: But?
translation.ja: だけど？

translation.en: But taking over a high-profile murder for a lawyer who was just gunned down
translation.ja: 射殺された弁護士の仕事よ まだ殺された理由も分かってない

translation.en: for God knows what reason, do we really think this is a good idea?
translation.ja: まだ殺された理由も分かってない

translation.en: The wolf is at the door, Maggie.
translation.ja: お金が必要なの

translation.en: I have been holding his practice together with string and glue.
translation.ja: 今までは何とかやりくりしてたけどね

translation.en: His life is bigger than just his law career.
translation.ja: 弁護士だけが仕事じゃない

translation.en: He needs to get back on his feet first. His daughter needs him back on his feet.
translation.ja: 彼の身を案じてる娘のことも考えて

translation.en: I know, and this could be the thing that gets him there.
translation.ja: だからこそよこの仕事で立ち直れる

translation.en: For the first time in a year, he's alive again. And you know Mickey.
translation.ja: この１年で初めて生き生きしてる

translation.en: The only thing he likes more than a fight is a fight with one hand tied behind his back.
translation.ja: 彼は不利な状況ほど燃えるタイプでしょ？

translation.en: [Mickey] I'll be about 15 minutes.
translation.ja: 15分ほどで戻る

translation.en: [Izzy] Sounds good.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: Welcome to the jungle.
translation.ja: 殺人現場へようこそ

translation.en: Remind me. We're never bringing the jury here. They'll hate this guy and we're doomed.
translation.ja: ここを陪審に見せたら反感を買うな

translation.en: [Cisco] Wife was there on the bed.
translation.ja: 妻はベッドの上

translation.en: Boyfriend there on the floor.
translation.ja: 妻の愛人は床に

translation.en: Police think Elliott stood at the door. Maybe watching them fuck--
translation.ja: 警察はエリオットがのぞいていたんだろうと

translation.en: Fornicate for a while before he came in and shot 'em.
translation.ja: しばらく性交した後射殺されてる

translation.en: [Mickey] Murder weapon was never found.
translation.ja: 凶器は未発見

translation.en: Probably out there in the ocean.
translation.ja: 海の中だろうな

translation.en: I don't know, Mick. You're good, but this good?
translation.ja: 本当に勝てると思うか？

translation.en: If they could place Elliott here.
translation.ja: どう見てもクロだぞ

translation.en: Motive all over. Positive gunshot residue.
translation.ja: 動機があり 射撃残渣(ざんさ)も出た

translation.en: Has he given you his story?
translation.ja: 彼の言い分は？

translation.en: Hey, listen, there's something else.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ　別件で話が

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: I know you're okay with me seeing Lorna and shit. At least you say you're okay with it.
translation.ja: 俺とローナの関係については気にしないと言ってたよな

translation.en: Lorna's been meaning to tell you when the time is right, but somehow,
translation.ja: ローナは折を見て話すと言ってるが⸺

translation.en: I suspect the time might never be right for her, so I'm just gonna say it.
translation.ja: 永遠にかかりそうだから俺から話すよ

translation.en: Me and Lorna,
translation.ja: 俺とローナは⸺

translation.en: we're gonna get married.
translation.ja: 結婚するんだ

translation.en: What do you mean, "Ah"? What is "Ah"? Is it okay with you?
translation.ja: 今のは何だよいいってことか？

translation.en: I'm not part of the equation, Cisco.
translation.ja: 俺には関係ないだろ

translation.en: But I wanna know, is it okay with you?
translation.ja: でも確認しておきたい

translation.en: Do you love her?
translation.ja: 愛してるか？

translation.en: With all my heart.
translation.ja: 心から

translation.en: Then it's all right with me.
translation.ja: なら問題ない

translation.en: But I'll tell you, Cisco. She's one of the four most important people in my life.
translation.ja: 彼女は俺の人生に大切な４人のうちの１人だ

translation.en: -Should you ever hurt her-- -Of course I would never.
translation.ja: 傷つけたら… まさか　誰より大切な人だ

translation.en: She's the greatest thing ever.
translation.ja: まさか　誰より大切な人だ

translation.en: Who's the fourth?
translation.ja: ４人目は？

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何が？

translation.en: You said four people.
translation.ja: ４人いると言った

translation.en: Hayley, Maggie, Lorna and--
translation.ja: ヘイリーとマギーとローナ

translation.en: Who's the fourth?
translation.ja: あと１人は？

translation.en: Mickey Haller.
translation.ja: ハラーです

translation.en: Yes, uh… Yes, I'll be there.
translation.ja: はい　すぐ行きます

translation.en: Trevor Elliott has summoned me.
translation.ja: エリオットに呼ばれた

translation.en: [Trevor] You checked out well.
translation.ja: 君を調べたよ

translation.en: High-performing trial lawyer, much better than Jerry according to most.
translation.ja: 確かにジェリーより優秀だったようだ

translation.en: Until you went off the deep end and became a drug addict.
translation.ja: 鎮痛剤に依存するまではな

translation.en: I'm not an addict now.
translation.ja: 今は違います

translation.en: Listen, Mickey. The thing about this case,
translation.ja: いいか　この裁判では⸺

translation.en: I need to win it in court and I need to win in the court of public opinion.
translation.ja: 無罪と世論の両方を勝ち取る必要がある

translation.en: The world is quick to cancel these days. Just take a look at my Twitter feed.
translation.ja: 一瞬で誹謗(ひぼう)中傷の的になる世の中だ

translation.en: I need a lawyer who can get me my freedom back and my name back.
translation.ja: 俺の自由と名声を取り戻せる弁護士が要る

translation.en: Are you that lawyer?
translation.ja: できるか？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: No, all I can do is get you a "Not guilty."
translation.ja: 無罪にはできても⸺

translation.en: I can't deliver you a finding of innocent.
translation.ja: 無実の証明はできない

translation.en: The courts don't work that way. Not guilty, best I can do.
translation.ja: 無実の証明はできない それが裁判の限界です

translation.en: And you can get that? For sure?
translation.ja: 確実に無罪になるか？

translation.en: Depends on what I have to work with.
translation.ja: 事件の内容によります

translation.en: -I didn't kill them. -I didn't ask you.
translation.ja: 殺してない それは…

translation.en: But I need you to know, I didn't.
translation.ja: それだけは確かだ

translation.en: All right, here's the deal, Trevor.
translation.ja: なら言おう

translation.en: I can win almost any case as long as I know what I'm dealing with.
translation.ja: 俺は状況が把握できてればほぼ確実に勝てる

translation.en: Right now, I don't.
translation.ja: 今は分からない

translation.en: So you lie to me, I don't want your case, however much I might need it.
translation.ja: 真相を話せないなら残念だが手を引かせてもらう

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: I was as far from cool as you can get in high school.
translation.ja: 俺は高校ではイケてなかった

translation.en: Girls wouldn't give me the time of day, but I could always talk to Zelda.
translation.ja: 女子とは無縁で遊び相手はゲームだけ

translation.en: Real life sucked.
translation.ja: 現実はクソだ

translation.en: But video games, they mattered.
translation.ja: ゲーム以外は必要なかった

translation.en: Then I met Lara.
translation.ja: でもララに出会って変わった

translation.en: She was different. She was beautiful, she was brilliant.
translation.ja: でもララに出会って変わった 美しく聡明で俺を愛してくれた

translation.en: And she loved me.
translation.ja: 美しく聡明で俺を愛してくれた

translation.en: We're just out of grad school, the game industry was exploding.
translation.ja: ゲーム業界は急成長していたが⸺

translation.en: But the problem that nobody could get around was the uncanny valley.
translation.ja: 誰も“不気味の谷”を越えられなかった

translation.en: Uncanny what?
translation.ja: 不気味の谷？

translation.en: If you're trying to make something humanlike, the human brain will reject it unless it's almost perfect.
translation.ja: 中途半端に人間に似たものを人の脳は不気味と感じる

translation.en: You know, video game characters were close to real,
translation.ja: だからキャラ作りは難しい

translation.en: but not close enough. Especially in the eyes, the eyes always gave it away.
translation.ja: 特に目に本物との違いが出る

translation.en: But the closer the characters resemble us,
translation.ja: でも完璧に近づければ

translation.en: the more connection we feel, the more we wanna play.
translation.ja: キャラに親近感が湧きプレイしたくなる

translation.en: That's the uncanny valley. And I was the one who crossed it.
translation.ja: その“不気味の谷”を俺は越えたんだ

translation.en: Working out of my garage.
translation.ja: 家の車庫でね

translation.en: One script, maybe 100 lines of code,
translation.ja: たった１つのスクリプト100行のコードが⸺

translation.en: changed everything.
translation.ja: すべてを変えた

translation.en: The girl in the game.
translation.ja: あれか？

translation.en: Nocturna.
translation.ja: 「ノクターナ」

translation.en: That was our first big hit.
translation.ja: 最初のヒット作だ

translation.en: It's what put us on the map. And, yes, I modeled the character after Lara.
translation.ja: そう このキャラはララがモデルになってる

translation.en: It's fair to say that her DNA is in everything this company has ever done.
translation.ja: この会社の歴史には彼女のＤＮＡが刻まれてる

translation.en: We were a team.
translation.ja: 俺たちはチームだった

translation.en: I didn't know she was cheating on me.
translation.ja: 浮気は知らなかった

translation.en: Looking back at it, I was working all the time,
translation.ja: 振り返ってみれば俺は仕事漬けで出張ばかり

translation.en: I was traveling too much, and she grew resentful.
translation.ja: 振り返ってみれば俺は仕事漬けで出張ばかり 彼女はそれに腹を立てていた

translation.en: Angry.
translation.ja: 彼女はそれに腹を立てていた

translation.en: I went out to the house that day to surprise her.
translation.ja: だからサプライズをしようと

translation.en: And instead…
translation.ja: でも俺が行くと…

translation.en: I will never get that out of my head as long as I live.
translation.ja: あの時の光景は一生 頭から離れない

translation.en: I found her like that. My own wife. My best friend.
translation.ja: 妻であり親友である人のあんな姿を見るなんて

translation.en: And that fucking yoga instructor.
translation.ja: ヨガのクソ講師と一緒に

translation.en: And everyone thinks I killed her,
translation.ja: 皆 俺を疑ってるが⸺

translation.en: but the truth is if I had found them alive,
translation.ja: 皆 俺を疑ってるが⸺ もし彼女が生きてたら別れなかった

translation.en: I wouldn't even have left her.
translation.ja: もし彼女が生きてたら別れなかった

translation.en: I would have begged her to come back to me because I need her.
translation.ja: 戻ってきてくれと懇願してたはずだ

translation.en: People say I'm a genius. The code I wrote, they call it magic.
translation.ja: 人は俺のコードを魔法のようだと言う

translation.en: Lara was the magic. She was the inspiration.
translation.ja: 俺の魔法はララだ 彼女がいなかったら俺は今でも車庫にいる

translation.en: Without her, I would still be sitting in my garage.

translation.en: I never could have killed her

translation.en: because without her…

translation.en: I have no magic.

translation.en: That's what you're dealing with. Can you work with that?

translation.en: I can win with that.

translation.en: Then you're hired.
